DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the protocol is to describe treatment patterns among patients with prostate cancer prior to diagnosis of castration-resistant state.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Patterns Among Patients With Prostate Cancer Prior to Diagnosis of a Castration-resistant State
DOC.criteria: Age â‰¥ 18 years Patients with prostate cancer who had developed a castration resistant state in the last 24 months prior to starting the study Patient must give written informed consent before any study related procedure Patients with medical histories lacking data required to evaluate the study objectives
